title: Client bugged, can't play event. Game works tho
body:
Here is a capture of what i'm dealing with.
Basically my client is bugged and i'm able to go to the links that the client links provide but I cannot access the Bligewater event. I can still start and create games, check champions and stats, and buy items. 

Does anyone have a fix for this, or does anybody know the cause of this bug? Thanks!

replies.body: Hello I work with the team that created the rewards for Bilgewater, just wanted to let you know we have seen a few reports for this issue and are actively investigating to see if we can identify a solution, so far it seems to be network related (meaning something funny happening with internet traffic for certain players)  In almost all cases we have received reports on this it seems like it goes back to normal on its own after a few client re-starts, if you continue to see the issue please let player support now.

> [{quoted}](name=I am Carlos,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ZO9KNFdY,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-24T22:26:31.436+0000)
>
> Hello I work with the team that created the rewards for Bilgewater, just wanted to let you know we have seen a few reports for this issue and are actively investigating to see if we can identify a solution, so far it seems to be network related (meaning something funny happening with internet traffic for certain players)  In almost all cases we have received reports on this it seems like it goes back to normal on its own after a few client re-starts, if you continue to see the issue please let player support now.

So if i've restarted my client about 20 times (this is not an exaggeration) then I should submit a help ticket?

Hey CPT VERMILLION,

Can you try resetting your Internet settings:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660#wq3
Thank you this fixed the issue on my end~!
Awesome! Thanks for letting me know!

Thanks for this solution!
Sadly, the problem persists :({{champion:32}}

I am having the EXACT SAME ISSUE. My screen looks exactly like that except I cannot click on the icons to choose for the event. 

After patching my computer dead locked (toggling the caps lock on did not produce the little light on the button). After 2 normal resets my BF told me the same thing happened to him ( he operates on a gaming laptop). And I would have to wait it out. After 10 minutes my computer started functioning normally but the screen looks EXACTLY like that. 

I can play the game, I can buy things, I can check my masteries, etc. But I CANNOT click on the icons for the event. The advice from the BF was to wait it out again but I don't think that will solve the issue. 

I will be following this thread, please if anyone finds the solution let us know.

Heya
Can you reset Internet Explorer and if that didnt help reinstall adobe flash and Adobe Air?

Regards Rkoturdo

Thanks for this solution!
Will try reinstalling Air and Flash in the morning.
